background.title2: Smart Solutions for Your Financial and Legal Needs
background.desc: Comprehensive solutions for your legal and financial needs through a team of highly experienced and qualified experts.

about.title: About Us
about.desc: The extension of the experiences of Saleh Al-Naim Office to become the Adrak International Company, which extends more than 50 years of experience in the field of professional and consultancy services provided by Adrak International Company.
about.vission-text: To achieve leadership in the Middle East by becoming the largest system for providing professional and consultancy services for auditing, accounting, finance, legal, and engineering businesses. This is through excellence and innovation in providing services to our clients to achieve sustainability for a spectacular present and a bright future for them.
about.mission-text: Providing professional and consultancy services characterized by accuracy and objectivity for our clients. We offer distinguished services through professional staff with long experience in the field of professional and consultancy services we provide. This ensures our clients that we are their ideal partner, providing a healthy work environment that yields success and continuous excellence for their companies.
about.goal-text: In alignment with the Kingdom's 2030 vision, we aim to reach the forefront of accounting and legal auditing offices in the Kingdom, and then in the Middle East and the world. We have strategic goals of building strong relationships with customers, achieving excellence in service delivery, and operational goals of providing services that comply with the best standards and professional practices.

services.title: Our Services
services.desc: We provide a wide range of services to help you with your financial and legal needs.
services.service-text-1: Analyzing potential benefits or expected losses to make decisions
services.service-text-2: Recording and registering all accounting transactions
services.service-text-3: Providing companies with a comprehensive assessment of risks and potential benefits of a deal
services.service-text-4: Offering advice for business continuity and facing financial difficulties
services.service-text-5: Assessing and improving the effectiveness of governance, internal control processes, and external auditing
services.service-text-6: Recording taxes, filing tax returns, handling inquiries, and paying fees
services.service-text-8: A team to provide advice on financial matters for individuals or entities
services.service-text-9: Assigning a financial manager to establish policies and prepare financial reports

contact.contactText: Keep in touch with us, we are always here to help you.
